Field Detail

distortionMeasure

int distortionMeasure
Indicates which distortion measure is selected by the user for controlling distortion.
Valid values are the following.
  • 0- No measure of distortion is going to be controlled.
  • 1- Measures the mean of the differences in absolute value.
  • 2- Measures the mean of the differences in quadratic value.

difference

long difference
Indicates the difference between the original image and the reconstred according to the selected distortion.

Negatives values are not allowed

numberOfPixels

long numberOfPixels
This value represents the number of pixels controlled in the distortion measure.

Negatives values are not allowed

defaultReconstructionValue

int defaultReconstructionValue
This value represents the value given to the pixels that have not received information yet.

Constructor Detail

DistortionCompute

public DistortionCompute(int distortionMeasure,
                         int defaultReconstructionValue)
Constructor of DistortionCalculus. It receives the distortion measure and the the default value for reconstruction at the beginning of the decoding process. The distortion value is computed respect to the transformed image.

Parameters:
distortionMeasure - definition in distortionMeasure
defaultReconstructionValue - definition in defaultReconstructionValue
Method Detail

initNewValue

public void initNewValue(int originalValue)
This function initializes the value of a pixel in the region of the transformed image where the distortion is computed.

Parameters:
originalValue - indicates the original value of a pixels in the transformed image.

improvedValue

public void improvedValue(int previousApproximation,
                          int currentApproximation,
                          int originalValue)
This function recomputes the distortion for a pixel whose approximation value is improved during the codification process.

Parameters:
previousApproximation - indicates the value previously approximated
currentApproximation - indicates the value currently appoximates
originalValue - indicates the original value

getDistortion

public float getDistortion()
This function computes the distortion selected by the user.

Returns:
a float value containing the value of the distortion according to the measure selected by the user.
